title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu of a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' action should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the TH module. 
2. Right-click on a field. 
3. From the context menu, select 'Add Javadoc'.
